title: Ep 357: Joe DeRosa & the Bobby Lee Sandwich
itunes:title: Ep 357: Joe DeRosa & the Bobby Lee Sandwich
description:
Bobby leaves early. Joe gets tanked. Patrice is just like us. We talk the Bobby Lee sandwich, barking with Asa, being Fugazi instead of U2, and lighting your pubes on fire. 

Butcher Box: Sign up today at www.butcherbox.com/BELLY and use code BELLY to get 1 pack of free bacon in EVERY box for the life of your membership PLUS $10 off your first order.

Ship Station: Sign up using promo code BELLY for a FREE 60-day trial today at www.ShipStation.com and start saving time with every shipment. click on the microphone at the top of the page, and type in BELLY. ShipStation. Make SHIP happen!
